usage.cn: 人生的道路就像一条大河，由于急流本身的冲击力，在从前没有水流的地方，冲刷出崭新的意料不到的河道。
usage.eng: The road of life is like a large river,because of the power of the currents,river courses appear unexpectedly where there is no flowing water.

usage.cn: 离你最近的地方 路途最远 最简单的音调 需要最艰苦的练习。 ——泰戈尔 《吉檀迦利》
usage.eng: It is the most distant course that comes nearest to you, and that training is the most intricate which leads to the utter simplicity of a tune.
